img.alt: Norris Student Selected to NSAA Student Advisory Committee

span.span: Norris Student Selected to NSAA Student Advisory Committee

div.p:
Vision Statement: All Norris students will develop the skills, knowledge, and attitudes necessary to be successful.
Mission statement: The Norris Public schools, in collaboration with its communities and families, shall provide the best possible learning experiences and opportunities to assure that all students have the capability to become responsible, productive citizens and life-long learners.

h2.a: Norris Student Selected to NSAA Student Advisory Committee

span.content: Norris Student Selected to NSAA Student Advisory Committee

div.div: Norris Sophomore Sophia Talero has been selected to serve on the NSAA Student Advisory Committee (SAC) for the 2020-2021 and 2021-2022 school years.There were over 75 applicants, and Sophia was selected as one of the 10 soon-to-be juniors on the committee. In...

div.div: Norris Middle School BulletinThursday, March 12th (B Day)HAL Menu: Everyone Report to LITT and check for missing assignments FIRST. Thursday: Bob Ross Coloring warmup for next week.Quiz Bowl - We won’t be meeting today (3/12). Mr. K has another commitment after school. ANY 8th grader, girl or boy, interested in trying out for Cheer for the 2020-2021 year, there will be a mandat...

Norris Middle School BulletinWednesday, March 11th (A Day)The Norris Middle School wrestlers had another great showing at their quadrangular at Gretna Aspen Creek. Our wrestlers won 13 matches total with 6 pins! They will next be in action Thursday, March 12th at Nebraska City for their Invitational.HAL Menu: Card Tournament Wednesday. Bob Ross Painting/ Murder Mysteries next week. Sign up...

Norris Middle School BulletinTuesday, March 10th (B Day)The Norris Middle School wrestlers competed at the Norris Invitational Saturday. All wrestlers competed hard in the long day of competition! Individual medalists were Brigham Schoenbeck (3rd place), Ryan Kraus (3rd place), and Eric Hall (2nd place). The team will next be in action Tomorrow, March 10th at Gretna Aspen Creek in a quadrangular w...
